items.name: Trump To Pick Hardee's/Carl's Jr. CEO For Labor Secretary, Reports Say
items.description: Andy Puzder, CEO of burger chains Hardee's and Carl Jr.'s, is an outspoken opponent of raising the minimum wage.

Andy Puzder, CEO of burger chains Hardee's and Carl Jr.'s, is an outspoken

items.name: Trump Lashes Out At Carrier Union After Leader Said President-Elect "Lied His Ass Off"
items.description: "If United Steelworkers 1999 was any good, they would have kept those jobs in Indiana," the president-elect tweeted.
items.description_markdown:
"If United Steelworkers 1999 was any good, they would have kept those jobs in

items.name: Trump Picks Oil And Gas Ally For Environment Post
items.description: Pruitt is the attorney general of Oklahoma and has antagonized the US Environmental Protection Agency through letters and lawsuits during the Obama administration.

items.name: Oakland Warehouse Fire Victims Were Trapped With "No Way Out"
items.description: Investigators said Wednesday there were no fire alarms or sprinklers installed inside the warehouse to warn victims of the deadly fire.
items.description_markdown:
Investigators said Wednesday there were no fire alarms or sprinklers installed
inside the warehouse to warn victims of the deadly fire.

items.name: Here Are 11 Insane Times Donald Trump Appeared On WWE
items.description: A fake Donald Trump also wrestled a fake Rosie O'Donnell, defeating her after throwing a cake in her face and head-butting her from the second rope.

items.name: At least 36 people have died in Friday's fire at a warehouse party in Oakland. Officials say they are no where close to finding a cause.
items.description: Officials are continuing to recover bodies from inside the Oakland warehouse, which had been hosting a party on Friday night when the blaze broke out.
items.description_markdown:
Officials are continuing to recover bodies from inside the Oakland warehouse,
which had been hosting a party on Friday night when the blaze broke out.

items.name: A judge has declared a mistrial in the case of a South Carolina officer who fatally shot Walter Scott, an unarmed black man, in 2015.
items.description: Michael Slager was charged with murder and manslaughter in the killing of Scott in 2015.
items.description_markdown:
Michael Slager was charged with murder and manslaughter in the killing of
Scott in 2015.

items.name: Amazon is opening a grocery store in Seattle that will allow shoppers to walk in and walk out — without pulling out their wallets 👀🍎
items.description: Enter a store, pick what you want, and walk out. It calls the system, um, "Just Walk Out."
items.description_markdown:
